com.iLabs.spice.services
Interface IApplication

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationImpl
public interface IApplication

The interface provide all application service for open-social site.

Author:
iLabs

Method Summary

          The api add appliction corresponding to userId.

          The api create a new application and also add the created application to user application corresponding to userId.
